name: Infinera Corporation
description: Infinera Corporation is a leading provider of advanced optical networking solutions, specializing in long-haul, metro, and data center interconnect networks. Founded in 2000 and headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, Infinera is renowned for its innovative technology that enables service providers and enterprises to deliver high-bandwidth services with unprecedented efficiency and scalability. The company's flagship products include the DTN-X platform and the Cloud Xpress series, which leverage photonic integrated circuits (PICs) to enhance capacity while reducing costs and power consumption. Infinera's solutions are designed to meet the growing demands of cloud computing, video streaming, and mobile data, positioning the company as a key player in the evolving telecommunications landscape. With a commitment to sustainability and energy efficiency, Infinera also focuses on reducing the environmental impact of network infrastructure. The company serves a diverse customer base, including telecommunications carriers, internet service providers, and large enterprises, empowering them to navigate the complexities of modern data traffic and connectivity. Infinera's mission is to transform the way the world connects, offering state-of-the-art technology that drives the future of networking.
